name: TheResumeWhisperer
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Resume Whisperer is your source for easy strategies and tips for developing your professional image, your career documents, and for spreading your wings. You can use the ideas you hear immediately for real results. Stand out from your peers with actionable advise based on researched and current developments. Jump start your job search!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
